generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, clearly designated for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and sometimes fences or planters.
- building: Multiple modern buildings with glass and concrete facades are visible along the street and in the background.
- fence: A metal fence runs along the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- traffic light: A red traffic light is visible at the intersection on the left side of the road.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including directional signs and regulatory signs mounted on poles.
- vegetation: Trees and greenery are visible along the sidewalks and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings, appearing clear and bright.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk in the distance on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are parked along the side of the road, and a car is visible in front of the camera.
- truck: A large white truck is visible in the center of the road, driving away from the camera.
- motorcycle: No motorcycle is visible in the image.
- bicycle: No bicycle is visible in the image.
- bus: No bus is visible in the image.
- train: No train is visible in the image.
- terrain: No terrain (grass, soil, etc.) is visible in the image.
- rider: No rider (on bicycle, motorcycle, etc.) is visible in the image.
